name: 3rd Scopus-Indexed AIP International Conference on Material Science, Smart Structures and Applications [ICMSS 2020]
content: On behalf of Surya Engineering College, we take massive preference in inviting all the participants from all over the world to attend the Material Science and Smart Structures conference entitled "International Conference on Material Science, Smart Structures and Applications (ICMSS 2020)" to be held in Erode, Tamil Nadu, India during 15-16, October 2020\. The conference will be organized around the theme “Escalating Innovative Material Science and Smart Structures for an Ingenious Future”.
